TEST_NAME: Page JS must avoid mouse events
QUERY_CLOB:
with aap as (
        select case
                 when (lower(trim(javascript_code)) like '%mousedown%'
                   or  lower(trim(javascript_code)) like '%mouseup%'
                   or  lower(trim(javascript_code_onload)) like '%mousedown%'
                   or  lower(trim(javascript_code_onload)) like '%mouseup%') then 'N' 
                 else 'Y'
               end pass_yn,
             application_id,
             page_id,
             created_by,
             created_on,
             last_updated_by,
             last_updated_on,
             build_option,
             page_mode,
             page_name,
	           javascript_code,
	           javascript_code_onload,
	           workspace
        from apex_application_pages
    )
select aap.pass_yn,                          
       aap.application_id, 
       aap.page_id,
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) has inaccessible js', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) has inaccessible js', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id) issue_title,
       aap.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aap.page_name,
       aap.page_mode,
			 aap.javascript_code,
	     aap.javascript_code_onload,
			 aap.workspace
from aap
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aap.application_id
where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: WCAG 2.0/2.1 - 2.5.2 Pointer Cancellation. Checking DA and JS for on down clicks events
